channel.title: Archaic317 / 24/7 VPS / DDOS Protected
channel.description:
[center][URL=http://s1323.photobucket.com/user/Jack_Whatley/media/Archaic%20Banner_zpsk9dtxlas.png.html][IMG]http://i1323.photobucket.com/albums/u588/Jack_Whatley/Archaic%20Banner_zpsk9dtxlas.png[/img][/URL][/center] [center][b] Archaic is a 317 Economy server. The server is lead by mature & fully dedicated team. [size=18pt][b][center]FREE CHAOTIC LONGSWORD WHEN YOU JOIN.[/center][/b][/size] We have an awesome staff team who is always avaliable to help you. Archaic offers you a widespread content all around the map featuring different Quests & Achivements to complete. At Archaic, we even have fully working highscores for you to compete with other players. We strive for a perfect gaming experience & even the smallest details are important to us. Our key is to provide as bug-free and as enjoyable content as possible!
- Staff Positions - Owner - Jack Head Admin - Freakshow Coder 1 - Fawzi Coder 2 - Open Admin 1 - Open Admin 2 - Open Head Moderator - Open Moderator 1 Open Moderator 2 - Open Head Helper - Open Helper 1 - Open Helper 2 - Open
If you ask for staff you will be Ip Banned, I put the Staff Positions that are available so you can see what you can work for. If you are inmterested In becoming a Staff Member Of Archaic317 Then Please Post Why you should be chosen i.e previous staff positions"No server names".
Archaic Features - Features - Loading 602 Data with 474 Maps Fullscreen/Resizable/Fixed F-Keys Zooming Highscores Awesome Donator benefit All skills working Active community Frequent Updates Stable / No Lag Quests Perfected Slayer system. Flawless combat Helpful & Active staff Full 63 Wave jad Good economy Good drop rates - Bosses - Godwars KBD Dagannoths Kalphite Queen Corporal Beast Tormented Demons Chaos Elemental Barrelchest
- Minigames - Duel Arena Barrows Fight Pits Fight Cave Ranging Guild Warriors Guild
[center][b]- Coming Soon - Callisto Scorpia Venenatis Vet'ion Zulrah[/b][/center]
- Client Download - http://www.mediafire.com/download/9mp8ceixh1dxy0x/Archaic317.jar
- Gallery - [/b][/center] [center][URL=http://s1323.photobucket.com/user/Jack_Whatley/media/RrKZhUz_zpsdxvgnywc.png.html][IMG]http://i1323.photobucket.com/albums/u588/Jack_Whatley/RrKZhUz_zpsdxvgnywc.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1323.photobucket.com/user/Jack_Whatley/media/zBbT74L_zpsdwdbrynf.png.html][IMG]http://i1323.photobucket.com/albums/u588/Jack_Whatley/zBbT74L_zpsdwdbrynf.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1323.photobucket.com/user/Jack_Whatley/media/GIAlcDm_zpsb2gkmddb.png.html][IMG]http://i1323.photobucket.com/albums/u588/Jack_Whatley/GIAlcDm_zpsb2gkmddb.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1323.photobucket.com/user/Jack_Whatley/media/dJnvW5D_zpsa0wgimmy.png.html][IMG]http://i1323.photobucket.com/albums/u588/Jack_Whatley/dJnvW5D_zpsa0wgimmy.png[/img][/URL][/center]

item.title: Archaic317 / 24/7 VPS / DDOS Protected
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Welliton_inc, post:2, topic:551969”]Oh god… Not this again…

You still haven’t fixed the rune platebody?[/quote]I guess I’ll chime in, it’s done in player updating by indicating that the torso piece is a platebody. That way it doesn’t render the arm bits underneath.

Read full topic
